Uniform Domain Name Dispute Resolution P.name: Uniform Domain Name Dispute Resolution Policy

21002.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

21003.quoteText:
You acknowledge and agree that (i) GoDaddy, in its sole and absolute discretion, may change or modify this Agreement, and any policies or agreements which are incorporated herein, at any time, and such changes or modifications shall be effective immediately upon posting to this Site, and (ii) your use of this Site or the Services found at this Site after such changes or modifications have been made shall constitute your acceptance of this Agreement as last revised.
If you do not agree to be bound by this Agreement as last revised, do not use (or continue to use) this Site or the Services found at this Site.
In addition, GoDaddy may occasionally notify you of changes or modifications to this Agreement by email.
21003.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
tosdr.tldr: They may notify, but without any guarantee.

21004.quoteText: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless (within 30 days of demand) the Registry Operator and Registry Service Provider and their subcontractors, subsidiaries, affiliates, divisions, shareholders, directors, officers, employees, accountants, attorneys, insurers, agents, predecessors, successors and assigns, from and against any and all claims, demands, damages, losses, costs, expenses, causes of action or other liabilities of any kind, whether known or unknown, including reasonable legal and attorney’s fees and expenses, in any way arising out of, relating to, or otherwise in connection with the your domain name registration, including, without limitation, the use, registration, extension, renewal, deletion, and/or transfer thereof and/or the violation of any applicable terms or conditions governing the registration.
21004.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

21005.quoteText: ou agree that these indemnification obligations shall survive the termination or expiration of the Agreement for any reason.
21005.title: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

tosdr.case: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

21006.quoteText: IN NO EVENT SHALL THE REGISTRY OPERATOR BE LIABLE TO YOU OR ANY OTHER PERSON FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES
21006.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

tosdr.case: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

21008.quoteText:
hen you register a domain name, you will have the following renewal options:

  1. Automatic Renewal. Automatic Renewal is the default setting. Domain names will automatically renew, for a period equivalent to the length of your original domain name registration, and payment will be taken from the Payment Method you have on file with GoDaddy, at GoDaddy's then current rates. Thus, if you have chosen to register your domain name for one (1) year, GoDaddy will automatically renew it for one (1) year.
21008.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

tosdr.case: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

21009.quoteText: You agree that for each domain name registered by you, the following contact data is required: postal address, email address, telephone number, and if available, a facsimile number for the Registered Name Holder and, if different from the Registered Name Holder, the same contact information for, a technical contact, an administrative contact and a billing contact.
21009.title: You must provide your identifiable information

tosdr.case: You must provide your identifiable information

21010.quoteText: You and GoDaddy further agree: (i) to arbitrate all Disputes between the parties pursuant to the provisions in these Terms.
21010.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

tosdr.case: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

21011.quoteText: You acknowledge and agree that GoDaddy and registry reserve the right to deny, cancel or transfer any registration or transaction, or place any domain name(s) on lock, hold or similar status, as either deems necessary, in the unlimited and sole discretion of either GoDaddy or the registry
21011.title: Your account and domains can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: A list of reasons is provided below that quote, but it is so long that anything could be considered as a good reason to block a domain or account.

21012.title: The service has a no refund policy

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy

21013.quoteText: While You can elect to deactivate the Service at any time, you also acknowledge and agree that the Service is subject to our Refund Policy, and that you may not be entitled to a refund
21013.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

21014.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

21015.quoteText: Subject to the provisions of Force Majeure below, we offer a service uptime guarantee (“Service Uptime Guarantee”) for paid services of 99.999% availability (defined below)
21015.title: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more

tosdr.case: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more

21016.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

tosdr.case: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

21017.quoteText:
or
  • participate in contests and surveys, apply for a job, or otherwise participate in activities we promote that might require information about you.
21017.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

tosdr.case: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

21018.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

tosdr.case: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
tosdr.tldr:
Full quote: "These technologies automatically collect data when you use and interact with our Services, including metadata, log files, cookie/device IDs, page load time, server response time, and approximate location information to measure website performance and improve our systems, including optimizing DNS resolution, network routing and server configurations. Specifically, interactions with the features, content and links (including those of third-parties, such as social media plugins) contained within the Services,
Internet Protocol (IP) address"

21019.quoteText: information about devices accessing the Services, including type of device, what operating system is used, device settings, application IDs, unique device identifiers and error data is collected.
21019.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and device fingerprinting

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
tosdr.tldr: Also: "Performance: Performance technologies may include first or third-party cookies, web beacons/pixels, and scripts placed in order to gather information about how you use our website (pages you visit, if you experience any errors, load times)."

21020.quoteText: We may share your personal information with affiliated companies within our corporate family, with third parties with which we have partnered to allow you to integrate their services into our own Services, and with trusted third party service providers as necessary for them to perform services on our behalf
21020.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

tosdr.case: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

21021.quoteText:
such as:

  • Processing credit card payments
  • Serving advertisements
  • Conducting contests or surveys
  • Performing analysis of our Services and customers demographics
21021.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation

tosdr.case: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

21022.quoteText: Advertising technology may include first or third-party cookies, web beacons/pixels, and scripts placed in order to gather information on the effectiveness of our marketing efforts, deliver personalized content
21022.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

21023.quoteText: or to generate data that allows for the delivery of advertising relevant to your specific interests on our sites, as well as third-party websites.
21023.title: This service tracks you on other websites

tosdr.case: This service tracks you on other websites

21024.quoteText: Performance: Performance technologies may include first or third-party cookies, web beacons/pixels, and scripts placed in order to gather information about how you use our website (pages you visit, if you experience any errors, load times). These cookies do not collect any information that could identify you and are only used to help us improve how our website works, understand the interests of our users, and measure how effective our content is by providing anonymous statistics and data regarding how our website is used.
21024.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

21025.quoteText: we currently do not alter our practices when we receive a “Do Not Track” signal from a visitor’s browser.
21025.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

tosdr.case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

21026.quoteText: If you wish to opt out of interest-based advertising click here [or if located in the European Union click here].
21026.title: Your personal data is used for advertising

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for advertising

21027.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising
tosdr.tldr: "If you wish to opt out of interest-based advertising click here [or if located in the European Union click here]."

21028.quoteText:
We will also disclose your information to third parties:

  • in the event that we sell or buy any business or assets (whether a result of liquidation, bankruptcy or otherwise),
21028.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

tosdr.case: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

21029.quoteText:
We may also contact you with offers for additional services we think you’ll find valuable if you give us consent, or where allowed based upon legitimate interests. You don’t need to provide consent as a condition to purchase our goods or services. These contacts may include:

  • Email
  • Text (SMS) messages
  • Telephone calls
  • Messenger applications (e.g. WhatsApp, etc.)
  • Automated phone calls or text messages.
21029.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

21030.quoteText: You may also update your subscription preferences with respect to receiving communications from us and/or our partners by signing into your account and visiting “Account Settings” page.
21030.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

21031.quoteText: We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of third-party sites. Please read the privacy policy of any website you visit.
21031.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

21032.quoteText: To the extent we are legally permitted to do so, we will take reasonable steps to notify you in the event that we are required to provide your personal information to third parties as part of legal process.
21032.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data

tosdr.case: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data

21033.quoteText:
We retain personal information only for as long as necessary to provide the Services you have requested and thereafter for a variety of legitimate legal or business purposes. These might include retention periods:

  • mandated by law, contract or similar obligations applicable to our business operations;
21033.title: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure

tosdr.case: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure

21034.quoteText: To easily access, view, update, delete or port your personal information, or to update your subscription preferences, please sign into your Account and visit “Account Settings.”
21034.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

tosdr.case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

21035.quoteText: If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about our Privacy Policy, or how we handle your personal data, you may contact our Office of the Data Protection Officer by email at privacy@godaddy.com.
21035.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

tosdr.case: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

21036.quoteText: Our Services are not targeted to, intended to be consumed by or designed to entice individuals under the age of 18.
21036.title: This service is only available to users over a 18 years of age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

21081.quoteText:
None of the Services found at this Site may be downloaded or otherwise exported or re-exported (i) into (or to a national or resident of) any country with which the United States has embargoed trade.
or (ii) to anyone on the U.S.
Treasury Department's list of Specially Designated Nationals or the U.S.
Commerce Department's Denied Persons List, or any other denied parties lists under U.S.
Export Laws.
